keyMoments.title: Wyper Plans Shandia Attack Strategy
keyMoments.description: Wyper discusses battle strategy with the Shandia warriors, analyzing Gan Fall's motivations and preparing for their assault on Upper Yard.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Wyper's leadership role and strategic thinking as the commander of the Shandia forces.

keyMoments.title: Leads Shandia Assault on Upper Yard
keyMoments.description: Acting on intelligence from Aisa, Wyper leads the Shandia warriors in launching their major offensive to reclaim their ancestral homeland.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Wyper taking decisive action in the war for Upper Yard, showing his commitment to the Shandia cause.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Upper Yard Was Part of Jaya
keyMoments.description: Nami discovers that Upper Yard was once part of Jaya, the island that Mont Blanc Noland visited 400 years ago, confirming the legendary explorer's story.
keyMoments.significance: Critical discovery that connects the Jaya and Skypiea arcs, proving Noland wasn't a liar and validating Cricket's faith in his ancestor.
keyMoments.quote: Upper Yard was once a part of Jaya!

keyMoments.title: Finds Noland's House
keyMoments.description: Nami confirms her discovery by identifying a building as the other half of Mont Blanc Noland's house, providing physical evidence of the connection.
keyMoments.significance: Provides tangible proof of Upper Yard's origin and Noland's truthfulness.
keyMoments.quote: This is the other half of Noland's house!

reveals.information: Nami's navigational skills and attention to detail allow her to piece together the geographical connection between Jaya and Upper Yard

keyMoments.title: Uses Mantra to Sense Fallen Warriors
keyMoments.description: Aisa uses her natural-born Mantra ability to sense that two warriors' voices have disappeared from Upper Yard, providing crucial intelligence for the Shandia's battle strategy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Aisa's rare Observation Haki ability and its strategic importance in warfare. Her intelligence triggers the Shandia assault.

abilities.description: Aisa can sense the presence, emotions, and life force of others, allowing her to detect when people die or lose consciousness.

reveals.information: Aisa demonstrates her Mantra ability by sensing when warriors fall in battle, proving her value as an intelligence asset

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Learns Gan Fall Was the Former God
keyMoments.description: After being rescued by giant South Birds, Chopper is shocked to discover that Gan Fall was actually the former God of Skypiea.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals important context about Skypiea's political history and Gan Fall's true status.

keyMoments.title: Realizes Her Dream Is Near
keyMoments.description: Upon discovering that Upper Yard is the ancient part of Jaya, Robin realizes that her lifelong dream of uncovering historical truths and finding Poneglyphs is within reach.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's personal investment in the Skypiea arc and foreshadows her discovery of the Poneglyph in Shandora.

reveals.information: Robin's quest for historical truth is reignited by the discovery that Upper Yard contains ancient Shandora ruins
